name: Everlasting Guardian
description:
"Is this a dream or reality?"

Enter Rian, a stickman from a small village. After waking up from a nap, he finds himself surrounded by big, burly BEASTS! Now, he must gather friends, grow his arsenal, and get to the bottom of this incident before the world is taken over!

~Includes~

  • +5 hours of a thrilling survival story as you fight to reclaim your world
  • Secrets and special weaponry to collect as you arm your crew for battle!
  • A quirky cast of characters each with their own purpose of taking back their world
  • Multiple endings let you decide the fate of the entire universe!
